name: Classic Grilled Cheese
description: A classic sandwich made with melted cheese between two slices of bread.
cookingSteps: 1. Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
2. Butter one side of each slice of bread.
3. Place one slice of bread butter-side down in the skillet and top with cheese.
4. Top with the other slice of bread, butter-side up.
5. Cook until bread is golden brown and cheese is melted, flipping once.
6. Serve hot.

name: Pasta with Marinara Sauce
description: A simple pasta dish with tomato sauce.
cookingSteps: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions.
2. Heat marinara sauce in a pan.
3. Add cooked pasta to the pan and stir until coated in sauce.
4. Serve hot.

name: Tomato Soup
description: A comforting soup made with fresh tomatoes.
cookingSteps: 1. Heat olive oil in a large pot.
2. Add onion and garlic and sauté until translucent.
3. Add chopped tomatoes, broth, salt, pepper, and sugar to the pot.
4. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
5. Use an immersion blender to blend until smooth.
6. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A classic salad made with chicken and Caesar dressing.
cookingSteps: 1. Season chicken with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
2. Grill chicken until cooked through.
3. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.
4. In a large bowl, toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
5. Add chicken to the bowl and toss to combine.
6. Top with croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
7. Serve cold.

name: Baked Salmon
description: A simple and healthy baked salmon dish.
cookingSteps: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F.
2. Place salmon fillet in a baking dish.
3. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes, until salmon is cooked through.
5. Serve hot.
